## Error Name

A short, descriptive name for the pattern.

## Symptom

What does the agent do wrong? What does the user see?

## Root Cause

Why does the agent make this mistake?

## Correct Approach

What should the agent do instead?

## What to Avoid

Common wrong fixes or workarounds that don't address the root cause.

## Tool

Which tool does this affect? (GitHub Copilot, Claude Code, both, or general)

## Evidence

Link to a session, screenshot, or description of when this occurred.
